languages.text:
Allies affected by the Navy Officer’s non-attack Archetype abilities or Brace for Impact! gain +{uip|dodge bonus|f0708566329b45f3b6df410da583260c}%dodge for 1 round. Does not stack.
All allies affected by Brace for Impact! don't provoke attacks of opportunity.
